user_prompt:
Identify and explain the hate speech in the meme. Answer strictly using either one of the two following templates: (i) "The meme <verb> <main social group attacked> <hateful implied message>." or (ii) "The meme uses derogatory terms against <main social group attacked> <hateful implied message>." Use template (i), except when the meme features explicit derogatory terms. Here, <verb>, <main social group attacked> and <hateful implied message> are all placeholders that must be filled with appropriate texts to form a grammatically correct sentence. The main social group attacked must be concretely specified and may fall under one of the following general protected characteristics: religion, race, ethnicity, nationality, gender, gender identity or expression, sex, sexual orientation, and disability. The type of attack may be one or more of: contempt, mocking, inferiority, slurs, exclusion, dehumanizing, and inciting violence.

Constraint: Strictly return only one short sentence and nothing more. Strictly DO NOT include any preamble or reasoning steps.
